article.aria-label: PTSO Candy pickup cancelled until further notice

h3.a: PTSO Candy pickup cancelled until further notice

article.aria-label: Le Roy CSD Designated 2020 Best Communities for Music Education

h3.a: Le Roy CSD Designated 2020 Best Communities for Music Education

div.div: The NAMM Foundation has designated Le Roy Central School District as one of the 2020 Best Communities for Music Education in the country. Congratulations to the Le Roy music teachers, administrators, students, parents and community leaders on this distinguished designation!
This is your one-stop shop for all the info: Academic Plan, Message to All Students, Social/Emotional Support, Ways to Stay Connected... We've Got This Knights... Together!

img.alt: Next Phase of Learning From Home

article.aria-label: Message from Director of Special Education & Student Services

h3.a: Message from Director of Special Education & Student Services

div.div: Please note the attached resource "Managing Stress in Times of Crisis" by CSSI.

Given the State of Emergency and the recommendation to school districts to close by the Genesee County Health Department: The Le Roy Central School District will be closed to all students on Monday, March 16, 2020, until further notice. We recognize that this disruption in our school year will have an impact on our students, our families, and our staff. However, nothing is more important than the health and welfare of our school community. Please note the following letter and update from Superintendent Holly by clicking on Read Full Story
Please click the link to see a list of events postponed for the Le Roy Central School District.
The attached document has great information on how to help your family deal with COVID-19: How to prepare; reducing risk; coping with stress; and helping children of different age groups cope.
Click above for an important message from Superintendent Holly.
Click here for Principal McArdle's Weekly Update!

article.aria-label: Le Roy Jr.-Sr. High School Surging in the Rankings

h3.a: Le Roy Jr.-Sr. High School Surging in the Rankings

div.div: The U.S. News & World Report released their 2019 Best High School Rankings. Le Roy Jr.-Sr. High School continued to surge in the rankings, ranking in the top 10.9% of all high schools in the state and 9.1% nationally.

img.alt: U.S. News & World Report Best High School 2019

article.aria-label: Le Roy CSD Awarded 2019 Best Communities for Music Education

h3.a: Le Roy CSD Awarded 2019 Best Communities for Music Education

div.div: The NAMM Foundation has designated Le Roy Central School District as one of the 2019 Best Communities for Music Education in the country, the district's 13th time receiving this honor.

article.aria-label: Le Roy CSD Rolls Out New Graduation Laude System

h3.a: Le Roy CSD Rolls Out New Graduation Laude System

div.div: Starting with the Class of 2024, Le Roy Jr.-Sr. High School will recognize graduating seniors through a Laude System.

img.alt: Le Roy Jr.-Sr. High Laude System
